chapter.title: Translating Reports
chapter.subtitle: Create reports in multiple languages
chapter.abstract: Implement support for reports in multiple languages simply by enabling Drupal's core module local.

chapter.title: Feeds Importing
chapter.subtitle: Create nodes using data blocks and/or reports
chapter.abstract: Use data blocks (and reports!) as input for importing using the Feeds module (to create Drupal nodes (or users) from it).

chapter.title: Bean Integration
chapter.subtitle: Create Drupal blocks out of reports
chapter.abstract: Use the Bean module to create blocks with a specific block type, which display a report in a Drupal block.

chapter.title: Views Row Style
chapter.subtitle: Create more complicated layouts than can typically be created using views
chapter.abstract: Extend the capabilities of the Views module, by using a report as a views row style, so that in a view you can use the templating engine to format the output of a view, e.g. if a highly customized HTML is needed.

chapter.title: WYSIWYG Editors
chapter.subtitle: Enhance the report editing experience for users not familiar with (x)HTML
chapter.abstract: Facilitate the editing of the report body using a wysiwyg editor (instead of editing HTML tags).
